By that first sentance I didn't meant that anyone had to repost 
anything. I meant that there was too much moding :-)

Status update: login script works. Didn't have Perl installed, so CGI 
scripts written in Perl just happened not to work. Everything's cool 
now :-)

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> Ok, that fight had too much moding in it to be acceptable. You 
can't 
> just grab bots out of other bots' hands. You can attempt to, but 
the 
> other person has to post if the attempt was successful. You can't 
> place a time bomb and have it explode in the same post, you have to 
> let the other person reply. There were also some minor things about 
> doing too many things in one post. Anyways, watch yourselves next 
> time!
> 
> 
> PS (to everyone). I wasn't on yesterday cause I was recabling my 
> house / setting up a new server. Some of you might have noticed 
that 
> the login script doesn't work right now. I'm still battling with 
the 
> server to get that working. I wasn't on today cause I had work 
(yup, 
> work on a saturday sucks), and then a few friends came over and we 
> had an unplanned LAN party, which took up the rest of the time. I'm 
> kinda pooped so I'll make a few quick posts and then go to sleep. 
> I'll post in full tomorrow, though.
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
